Message:
It’s only natural for those
like me to be nameless.
Simply referring to us as
“shadows” is more than enough.

That’s why,
I’m sure I misheard her...

“If thou art to be my shadow,
live and be useful to me.
Such is what it means to protect.
Understand, Asahi?”

In that moment,
I felt I’d taken
my first proper look
at the Princess’s face.

Her stern gaze was shaking
with loneliness and unease...

It revealed the Princess’s true colors.
And, a heart that no one
had ever dared peer into...

“Yes. I shall live
and be useful to you.
As your shadow.”
